item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 5: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer shows growth, crosses ₹100 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 5: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer shows growth, crosses ₹100 crore

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The political thriller Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has crossed the ₹100 crore mark at the box office within its first five days of release, despite receiving mixed reviews.

  • The film collected ₹10 crore on its fifth day, totaling ₹105.44 crore net in India.
  • Game Changer had a strong opening day, grossing ₹51 crore, but saw a decline over the subsequent days.
  • It faced stiff competition from Balakrishna's Daaku Maharaaj.
  • The film's overall occupancy was 34.13 percent on its fifth day.
“Karthik Subbaraj has penned Game Changer’s story; ... the version you get, while entertaining, feels rehashed from Shankar’s previous works.” - Hindustan Times Review

Despite a lukewarm reception, Game Changer’s box office performance demonstrates its commercial appeal, aided by star power and audience expectations.

item.description:

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor holds daughter Raha in his arms after she trips during their playtime - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor and Raha Kapoor were spotted having a fun evening together where they played along with each other at a practice ground.

Publication Date: Jan 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

It was game night for Ranbir Kapoor and his darling daughter Raha Kapoor on Tuesday. The actor was spotted having an adorable time with Raha at a private sports practice ground in Mumbai. Raha ran around, smiled, and talked with dad Ranbir during their outing.

  • Ranbir and Raha had playful interactions beside a tennis court, where Raha was seen wearing a white shirt and pants.
  • Raha tripped and fell during playtime, but Ranbir quickly picked her up and comforted her.
  • Alia Bhatt was also present at the location practicing pickleball.
“Being a doting father, Ranbir picked her up immediately and rubbed the part on her knee where she fell.”

The Kapoor family recently returned from their Thailand vacation, where they celebrated the New Year together. Ranbir and Alia are expected to be seen next in the film Love & War.

item.title: Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...' - News18
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...'

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: News18

Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha shared a memorable moment on the sets of their classic film, Silsila, during a challenging scene that persisted amidst the pressure of a large audience.

  • Rekha recalled feeling nervous during an intense emotional scene with 15,000 people present.
  • Amitabh Bachchan shared a story about James Dean to help Rekha cope with the pressure.
  • Rekha expressed gratitude for Amitabh's supportive words during the filming.
  • The audience reacted strongly when Rekha hugged Amitabh after the scene.
  • Rumors continue about the close off-screen relationship between Amitabh and Rekha.
“It was such an intense scene... I asked Yashji (Chopra, Director) for time, but he said no.” - Rekha

This moment on set exemplifies the camaraderie between Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha, enhancing their legendary status in Indian cinema.

"The first-look poster shows the protagonist’s amusing dilemma, radiating a pleasant vibe."

item.title: Jaideep Ahlawat's father dies, actor rushes to Delhi leaving Paatal Lok 2 promotions - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jaideep Ahlawat Rushes to Delhi Following Father's Passing

Date: Jan 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Jaideep Ahlawat's father died on January 14, 2025. The actor has rushed to Delhi to be with his family during this challenging period.

  • Jaideep's team confirmed the news and requested privacy for the family.
  • Jaideep's father was a retired teacher who supported his acting ambitions.
  • Ahlawat is preparing for the release of Paatal Lok 2, set to premiere on January 17.
“We are deeply saddened to announce the passing of Jaideep Ahlawat's beloved father. He departed for his heavenly abode surrounded by family and love.”

This tragic loss comes just as Jaideep Ahlawat is gearing up for the much-anticipated release of Paatal Lok 2.

item.title: ‘Brad Pitt’ scams French woman of ₹7.37 crore from 'hospital bed', amid ‘divorce from Angelina Jolie’ | Today News - Mint
item.description:
‘Brad Pitt’ scams French woman of ₹7.37 crore from ’hospital bed’, amid ‘divorce from Angelina Jolie’

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

In a shocking tale, a 53-year-old French woman named Anne was scammed out of €830,000 by someone impersonating Hollywood actor Brad Pitt through social media and phone communications. The con artist led her to believe they were in a romantic relationship, convincing her to send money under various pretenses, including customs fees for luxury gifts and medical expenses.

  • Anne received a message from an account posing as Brad Pitt's mother, leading to her being contacted by the impersonator.
  • The scammer proposed marriage, resulting in Anne divorcing her wealthy husband.
  • After losing her initial funds, he claimed he needed money for kidney cancer treatment.
  • Anne eventually realized she had been duped after seeing real photos of Brad Pitt with his new partner.
  • This incident highlights the ongoing risks associated with online scams, especially involving celebrity impersonation.
“It hurts me to do it, but I tell myself that I might save a man's life,” Anne reflected during the ordeal.

This story serves as a grave reminder of the dangers of online deception, particularly for vulnerable individuals.

item.title: Sonu Sood reveals Salman Khan ‘stole’ Munni Badnaam from him in Dabangg: ‘I told them its wrong, I had only one song’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Sonu Sood reveals Salman Khan ‘stole’ Munni Badnaam from him in Dabangg: ‘I told them it’s wrong, I had only one song’

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Sonu Sood discussed his experience with the blockbuster film Dabangg, claiming that Salman Khan took his item song Munni Badnaam, originally intended for him.

  • Salman Khan's Dabangg was a massive hit in 2010.
  • Sonu Sood initially declined the role of Chulbul Pandey, which was ultimately given to Salman Khan.
  • Sood shared that he requested an item song as a condition to accept his role as the antagonist.
  • Despite his insistence, the song was ultimately given to Salman during a scene.
“I said, ‘It is my song, how will he come in between like that’. I told them that it’s wrong, I only had one song.”

Sonu's latest project, Fateh, is currently showing in theaters, while Salman Khan is preparing for his upcoming film Sikandar, set for release on Eid 2025.

item.title: Rasha Thadani was studying for her business management exam during 'Uyi Amma' shoot; says her parents Rav - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Rasha Thadani Balances Acting and Studies While Shooting 'Uyi Amma'

Publication Date: EXCLUSIVE

Rasha Thadani, daughter of actress Raveena Tandon, is preparing for her debut in the film 'Azaad'. Despite her budding acting career, she continues to prioritize her education in business management.

  • Rasha is making her acting debut alongside Aaman Devgn in 'Azaad'.
  • She received positive feedback for her song 'Uyi Amma'.
  • Raveena Tandon emphasizes humility and grounding in Rasha's upbringing.
  • Rasha was studying for her business exams while shooting for 'Uyi Amma'.
  • 'Azaad' is set for release on January 17.
“I was studying even when I shot 'Uyi Amma'. I had my business exam the day after filming,” Rasha Thadani shared.

Rasha Thadani's journey reflects a blend of ambition and dedication, showcasing her commitment to both her family and her studies.

item.description:
Rekha revealed Amitabh Bachchan calmed her, told her 'it's just acting' during..., says 'I hugged Amit ji toh...'

Published: Not provided Source: India.com

During the filming of Yash Chopra’s iconic movie Silsila, Rekha experienced significant pressure while filming an emotional scene. Amitabh Bachchan provided her comfort and perspective, helping her navigate the tense moment.

Key Points

  • Rekha discussed the intense pressure while filming an emotional scene with 15,000 people present.
  • Amitabh Bachchan calmed Rekha by sharing an anecdote about James Dean during filming.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

“It was such an intense scene and there were 15,000 people on the location at five in the morning.” – Rekha

item.title: Fake Brad Pitt uses love poems, AI photos to swindle French woman out of ₹7 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fake Brad Pitt Uses Love Poems and AI Photos to Scam French Woman Out of ₹7 Crore

Publication Date: Jan 14, 2025 06:37 PM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

A scammer impersonating actor Brad Pitt convinced a French woman to send over 800,000 euros under the pretense of helping with medical treatment related to his fake kidney operation.

  • The scammer used altered photos and AI-generated videos to convince Anne that she was in a relationship with Brad Pitt.
  • Initially contacted by someone impersonating Pitt's mother, things escalated quickly to Anne believing she was in a romantic relationship with the actor.
  • Anne sent large sums of money for fictitious medical expenses, lured by promises of gifts and marriage.
  • After realizing the truth, Anne suffered from severe depression and reported the scam to the police.
  • This is not the first scam, as several others have reported similar incidents involving the fake actor.
Anne revealed, "There are so few men who write such things. I liked the man I was talking to and he knew how to talk to women."

The incident highlights the dangers of online scams and the emotional manipulation involved. Authorities are investigating the case as the trend of celebrity impersonation scams rises.

item.title: ‘Jailer 2’: Rajinikanth back as ‘Tiger’ Muthuvel Pandian in Nelson’s sequel - The Hindu
item.description:
‘Jailer 2’: Rajinikanth Returns as 'Tiger' Muthuvel Pandian in Sequel

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: The Hindu

Superstar Rajinikanth and director Nelson are collaborating once again for the upcoming film Jailer 2, a sequel to their successful movie released in 2023.

  • The sequel was officially announced via a video on Pongal, January 14, 2025.
  • Nelson shared humorous insights related to past events since his last release, while setting the stage for the new film.
  • The teaser hints at the return of ‘Tiger’ Muthuvel Pandian, a character known for his fierce reputation.
  • Rajinikanth was last seen in the hit film Jailer, which became the highest-grossing Tamil film of 2023.
  • The movie is produced by Sun Pictures, continuing their collaboration with Rajinikanth.
“Since the release of my last film, five cyclones have gone by and Donald Trump has become the president of the US.” - Director Nelson

With Jailer 2, fans can expect more action and entertainment as Rajinikanth reprises his iconic role.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut's Emergency To NOT Release In Bangladesh, Film Banned Because Of THIS Reason - News18
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut's Emergency Film Banned in Bangladesh Due to Political Strains

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: News18

The upcoming film ‘Emergency’, directed by Kangana Ranaut and based on the life of Indira Gandhi, will not release in Bangladesh due to strained political relations between the two countries.

  • The film addresses the Emergency declared in India in 1975.
  • Its ban is attributed to ongoing geopolitical issues rather than its content.
  • Indira Gandhi is portrayed as playing a crucial role in the Bangladesh Liberation War.
  • The film highlights the assassination of Sheikh Mujibur Rehman, a pivotal figure in Bangladesh's history.
“The decision to halt the screening of ‘Emergency’ in Bangladesh is tied to the current strained relations between India and Bangladesh.”

The situation reflects the changing dynamics between India and Bangladesh, especially after the political shift in Bangladesh's leadership.

item.title: ‘Kareena was asked to leave Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai’: When Ameesha revealed reason behind Bebo’s exit from Hrithik’s film - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ameesha Patel Reveals Why Kareena Kapoor Left 'Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai'

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

As 'Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai' celebrates its 25th anniversary, Ameesha Patel shares insights on Kareena Kapoor's exit from the film, which was surrounded by misunderstandings.

  • Kareena Kapoor was originally cast in 'Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai' opposite Hrithik Roshan.
  • Reports claimed Kareena left due to issues between her mother and Hrithik's father, Rakesh Roshan.
  • Ameesha Patel stated that Kareena was asked to leave the film, contrary to earlier reports of her walking out.
  • After Kareena's exit, Ameesha was signed for the role within 3 days.
  • Kareena debuted in the same year with 'Refugee', while Hrithik and Ameesha became Bollywood stars with their film.
“Actually, she (Kareena) didn’t back out. From what Rakesh ji told me, he asked her to leave the film because they were having differences.” - Ameesha Patel

This revelation has generated discussions about the potential on-screen chemistry that could have been if Hrithik and Kareena had starred together in the film.

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor Lets Her Rs 3.48 Lakh Little Black Dress Do All The Talking - NDTV
item.description:
Janhvi Kapoor Wows in Rs 3.48 Lakh Little Black Dress

Date: N/A Source: NDTV

Janhvi Kapoor, known for her fashion sense, made headlines by wearing a stunning black wool mini dress by Balmain priced at Rs 3.48 Lakh.

  • The dress features a structured fit with large chunky gold buttons.
  • It includes bold white lapels and a deep neckline for added drama.
  • Janhvi styled the outfit with classic black pumps and minimal gold accessories.
  • She completed her look with dewy makeup and wavy hair.
"Janhvi Kapoor's corpcore looks are bookmarked by many fashion aficionados."

This fashion statement solidifies Janhvi Kapoor's status as a style icon.

item.title: Pic Talk: Allu Arjun’s joyous Sankranthi celebrations with family - 123telugu
item.description:
Pic Talk: Allu Arjun’s joyous Sankranthi celebrations with family

Published on Jan 14, 2025 6:00 pm IST | Source: 123telugu.com

Icon Star Allu Arjun is riding high on the success of his recent film Pushpa 2: The Rule, which has set a new record as the highest-grossing Indian film in the country. Amidst this career milestone, he took some time to celebrate the Sankranti festival with his family.

  • Allu Arjun and family posed in traditional attire during Sankranthi celebrations.
  • Heartwarming pictures shared by Allu Sneha Reddy captured their joyful moments.
  • The images received widespread admiration from fans on social media.
  • Allu is preparing for a new project with director Trivikram, rumored to reimagine the Mahabharata.
“The photos quickly went viral, receiving fans’ outpouring of love and admiration.”

Allu Arjun continues to be a beloved figure in the Telugu cinema landscape, and his family celebrations resonate with fans.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Day 4 (All Languages): Unlocks The 100 Crore Club, Becomes 3rd Ram Charan Film To Achieve The Mark! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Day 4 (All Languages): Unlocks The 100 Crore Club, Becomes 3rd Ram Charan Film To Achi

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

The political action thriller, Game Changer, co-starring Kiara Advani, directed by Shankar, has officially entered the 100 crore club in India, marking a significant achievement for Ram Charan.

  • Day 1: 54 crores
  • Day 2: 22 crores
  • Day 3: 18.8 crores
  • Day 4: 7.85 crores

Total: 102.65 crores

“Game Changer has now officially entered the 100 crore club.”

As it continues to gain popularity, it is poised to surpass the lifetime earnings of Ram Charan’s previous works.

item.title: Fateh Box Office Collection Day 4: Sonu Sood’s Film Is Leading The Race Against Bollywood’s First Release Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 4: Sonu Sood’s Film Is Leading The Race Against Bollywood’s First

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Koimoi

Sonu Sood and Jacqueline Fernandez starrer Fateh is the first Bollywood release of 2025. It arrived in theatres alongside Ram Charan’s Game Changer, which is also performing well. Fateh experienced a significant drop in box office earnings on Monday.

Suffers huge fall on Monday

Fateh started strong with earnings of 2.61 crores but saw a big decline on Monday, earning only 1.50 crores* which is a 63% drop from 4.13 crores on Sunday.

Take a look at the day-wise box office breakdown below:

  • Day 1: 2.61 crores
  • Day 2: 3.97 crores
  • Day 3: 4.13 crores
  • Day 4: 1.50 crores (estimates)

Total: 12.21 crores*

Fateh vs Merry Christmas (4-Day Total)

Compared to Merry Christmas, Fateh has outperformed with a total of 12.21 crores* against 10.65 crores for its competitor.

Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.

Stay tuned for more box office updates.

item.title: Nargis Fakhri says she found *b**b thrusting in Bollywood dance numbers difficult; reveals she left the i - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Nargis Fakhri says she found *b**b thrusting in Bollywood dance numbers difficult; reveals she left the industry due to an unfortunate situation

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Nargis Fakhri expresses her difficulties with specific dance moves in Bollywood and reveals her departure from the industry due to personal challenges.

  • Nargis found certain dance moves, particularly *b**b thrusting, challenging.
  • She left the Bollywood industry due to an unfortunate situation, although details are limited.
  • The conversation highlights the pressures and difficulties actors face in the industry.
“It was difficult for me to perform certain dance numbers that required *b**b thrusting.”

This article sheds light on the unique challenges faced by actors in Bollywood, particularly regarding dance requirements and personal circumstances that can lead to stepping away from a career in such a competitive field.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan calling comparison with Hrithik Roshan ‘shameless’, Rakesh Roshan getting shot: Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai at 25 - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan calling comparison with Hrithik Roshan ‘shameless’, Rakesh Roshan getting shot: Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai at 25

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

This article reflects on the impact of the film Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai on Bollywood, marking 25 years since its release and the ensuing stardom of Hrithik Roshan, alongside Shah Rukh Khan's remarks on their comparisons and significant family events.

  • Shah Rukh Khan expressed disdain for comparisons with Hrithik Roshan, calling them 'shameless'.
  • Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai was a pivotal film in Hrithik Roshan's career, leading to a significant stardom debut.
  • Rakesh Roshan was shot shortly after his son's film became a massive success, highlighting challenges faced by filmmakers.
  • The rivalry between Hrithik Roshan and Shah Rukh Khan during this period was well noted, causing tension in the industry.
  • The film and Hrithik's debut changed dynamics in Bollywood, emphasizing the evolution of stardom.
“I entered as a nobody and when I came out, there was hysteria all around me.” - Hrithik Roshan

The article delves into the changing landscape of Bollywood stardom and the personal challenges faced by the Roshan family amidst rising fame.
